title: Ep. 218: Cleansing Brush Blues, Crooked Smiles & The Week's Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 218: Cleansing Brush Blues, Crooked Smiles & The Week's Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: In this week's episode, we're talking about the shuttering of the Clarisonic brand, how pregnancy can mess with your teeth, and of course, the biggest beauty headlines right now. This week, Fenty Skincare has hit the scene; Allure declares ...
description:
In this week's episode, we're talking about the shuttering of the Clarisonic brand, how pregnancy can mess with your teeth, and of course, the biggest beauty headlines right now. This week, Fenty Skincare has hit the scene; Allure declares "Mochi Skin" a thing; touchless sampling is on the rise; "Pretty Shouldn't Hurt," a short film about the pain of protective hairstyles, is available to view; and new research about rosacea. -- Want more Fat Mascara? Take our listener survey: fatmascara.com/survey; Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email : info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
